: Starting April 4, co-founder Larry Page, becomes CEO and takes over day-to-day operations. Co-founder Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects, specifically, new products. Eric Schmidt becomes Executive Chairman and will focus externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership-all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach. Internally, Eric Schmidt will continue to act as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin . Labour deputy leader Harriet Harman , speaking on Sky News, said: Hacking into people's phones is illegal. Obviously the criminal law has got to be complied with and if it is broken then it should be investigated by the police and it should be enforced.`` Nobody is above the law, no newspaper editor, no journalist.
